actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO APS_CUSTOMER
(OID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CUSTOMER_PARTICIPANT_ID,
CUSTOMER_APPLICANT_NAME,
CUSTOMER_APPLICANT_MOBILE,
CUSTOMER_APPLICANT_EMAIL,
CUSTOMER_PARTICIPANT_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_COUNTRY_ID,
CUSTOMER_COUNTRY_CODE,
CUSTOMER_REGISTERED_ENTITY_INDFOREIGN,
CUSTOMER_REGISTERED_ENTITY_IND_CORP_NOCORP,
CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_GSTN_DESC,
CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_GSTN_DESCTYPE,
CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_CONST_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_NAME
)
VALUES
  (
    {{ appsmith.store.customerOID}},
		{{ appsmith.store.customerID }},
		{{ appsmith.store.customerParticipantID }},
		{{appsmith.store.vayApplicantName}},
		{{appsmith.store.vayApplicantMobile}},
    {{appsmith.store.vayApplicantEmail}},
		{{appsmith.store.vayRoleSelection }},
    {{appsmith.store.vayCountryofRegistration }},
		{{appsmith.store.vayCountryofRegistration}},
		{{appsmith.store.customerIsIndForeign }},
		{{appsmith.store.customerCorpNonCorp }},
		{{vayGSTNInput.text }},
		{{vayGSTNRespConstitution.vayBusinessNameList}},
		{{vayGSTNRespConstitution.selectedOptionValue}},
		{{vayGSTNRepsBusinessInfo.text}}
	);
